item.title: CVE-2024-30436|2024-03-29T17:25:05.318Z -- Collect.chat Inc. -- Collectchat
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Collect.Chat Inc. Collectchat allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Collectchat: from n/a through 2.4.1.
